column4: Ok so I am using the restricted driver for my video card which has two monitor attached, only one monitor displays when I use restricted, when i dont I can see both monitor, but identical. not an extended.
Anyone point me in right direction of getting my second monitor working?
what's the result of lspci | grep -i vga  ?
weird that it says unknown device, but this might help: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NvidiaMultiMonitors
